channel.title: "Show new replies to your posts." link makes my anti virus go off
channel.description:
This is the third time now I've clicked on "Show new replies to your posts." and it made my anti virus go off.
[img]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/6295/screenshot093hu.png[/img]
Why is this? Does this happen to anyone else?

item.title: "Show new replies to your posts." link makes my anti virus go off
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

looks like the antivirus software has some quirks in it. Moparscape is fine i know that smf cannot carry a virus in it’s coding (thats way too risky for the site). McAfee and Norton don’t see anything wrong with this site so i trust those more.

Read full topic

item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

I got keylogged my level 134 RS account by this site. Don’t trust it.

Lies. Probably ads, or it trying to popup to a new window.

I can assure you theres nothing wrong with the site.
